descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56064-1-1405589595.png[/img][/center]


Description
___________

This mod adds 10 new swords to your game. A lot of these are based on Morrowind weapons (Sword of Agustas, Clanbringer, Fury, Magebane, Shadowsting, Shimsil, Temreki, Blade of White Woe, Huntsman Sword), and one from Oblivion (Blackwater Blade).

[i][size=1]NOTE: I no longer support this mod, as these weapons look outdated in my eyes. [/size][/i]


How to Obtain
_____________

[color=#ffe599](MAIN FILE ONLY)[/color]

When in-game, type the following console command...

[b]help Billyro 0[/b]

... and find the ID of [i]"Billyro's Chest o' Blades"[/i], then type...

[b]player.placeatme (Insert ID) 1[/b]

... and you can access the swords in the spawned chest.


[color=#ffe599](CHEST AT REFUGEE'S REST OPTIONAL FILE)[/color]

If you download the optional file "Chest at Refugee's Rest", you can simply go to Refugee's Rest (East of Windhelm) and get the swords without having to spawn the chest.


[color=#ffe599](CRAFTABLE SWORDS VERSION)[/color]

If you download the optional file "Craftable Swords", you can craft all the swords at a forge. You need the Steel Smithing Perk to be able to make them, though, as well as the required materials. 



Compatibility
____________

This mod will not conflict with any other mods.

The only conflict will be when you chop enemy heads off. :P

(It was a joke...)



Installation
__________

Installation is the standard procedure. If you don't know how to install manually, then just use NMM.



Changelog
_________

1.1 - added scabbards to all one handed swords

1.0 - initial release



Tools Used
__________

3DS Max
Paint.NET
Photoshop CS6
Nifskope
author: Billyro
